metadata.synopsis: The Dark Urge sees themselves and Orin in the Bhaal temple. Only one of them is given the Slayer form. The Butler of Bhaal is not present, but is the one giving the voiceover and information about what is happening. The icon of Bhaal looms over all. We see spectres of those we have had to kill, if we were on the Embracing track.If we turn into the Slayer, it should automatically start the dialogue after this with Jaheira, if present, talking about the Slayer.

18.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
18.text: Triumph after triumph, you have excelled in base villainy.
18.context:
CinematicNodeContext:  Orin beckons the DU closer.The Dark Urge approaches the altar.
[MK] - Player wakes, sits up into focus and is confronted by the image of the temple. Slowly stands up while looking around. End of shot their eyes lock onto something high off screen.

33.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
33.text: For one who fights with monsters should look to it that they themselves become a monster.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - Push in on insignia of Bhaal skull to show what player is looking at... On dialogue "becomes a monster" the eyes burst into flames casting lightNodeContext: This is the original intro line from Baldur's Gate 1 - great emphasis should be placed upon it.

0.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
0.text: When you gaze long into the abyss the abyss also gazes into you.
0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The eyes of the insignia of Bhaal at the back of the temple light up, glowering over you and Orin.
[MK] MCU Player reacts, then glances down to see Orin on altar playing with the dagger "...into the abyss..", 
Orin looks up locking eyes with player after/on line "...the abyss also gazes into you"NodeContext: This is the second intro line from baldur's gate 1, if anything is a time-honoured truth espoused by the Butler, it's this.

69.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
69.text: You have reached the time of majority, and you shall come into your birthright.
69.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge's body starts to transform, once Bhaal's icon has lit up.
[MK] - Orin rolls/spins off the altar, raising dagger to player.

14.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
14.text: But another seeks to disinherit you. Do not let her be your death.
14.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge becomes the Slayer
[MK] - frame in as they square off against eachother. Cut to DU as they become slayer form

43.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
43.text: Your Father loves you best. You have already made us so proud.
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge steps on Orin while they are in slayer form. Orin snarls, and protests.

26.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
26.text: Slaughter your line. Become the last of your name.
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - CU/OTS looking at DU slayer, menacing. Cut on snarl

17.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
17.text: Lord Bhaal shall have but one Chosen.
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - end snarl from previous shot. Profile shot framing Slayer top left and Orin lower right. alien queen-esque Faceoff. With Bhall insignia blasing behind them.

16.speaker: Narrator
16.text: *Memories flood back - snatches of your story, written in the blood of a thousand victims.*
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge wakes up from their dream and is back in camp

67.speaker: Narrator
67.text: *Years spent in worship of Bhaal, leading his savage congregation in prayer, sacrifice, and slaughter.*

65.speaker: Narrator
65.text: *You were their Master, and he was yours. A cruel Master, a Dread Lord... a devoted Father.*

71.speaker: Narrator
71.text: *All is greater than you could have dreamed. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
71.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: Revel in the memories of murder.

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *The cruelty of the Slayer leaps around within.*

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *Dear sister must die by your hand, an offering in Bhaal's sanctum.*

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *Your heart pines for the love of your Lord.*

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *Today is a wonderful day for murder.*
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge will always transform back into normal form in gameplay the second this cutscene is over.

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: Shudder. This has gone too far.

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *If you want to be free of your Urge, you must confront your past.*

56.text: Recall that there was another - the woman beneath your feet.

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *You are not the last of your name. Not yet.*

50.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.

28.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
28.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.
[MK] - Player wakes, sits up into focus and is confronted by the image of the temple. Slowly stands up while looking around.

13.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
13.text: You have disobeyed your Father's wishes one time too many.
13.context:
CinematicNodeContext:  Orin beckons the DU closer.The Dark Urge approaches the altar.
[MK] - DU eyes lock onto something high off screen.

19.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
19.text: There was much disappointment at your reluctance to kill the little Moonmaiden.

35.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
35.text: Your inheritance of your estate depends on you maintaining a healthy stream of kills.

8.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
8.text: Another will embrace what you have rejected.
8.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The Orin's body starts to transform, once Bhaal's icon has lit up.
[MK] - Orin rolls/spins off the altar, raising dagger to player.

7.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
7.text: And that other will be your death.
7.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Orin becomes the slayer.
[MK] - frame in as they square off against eachother. Cut to DU as they become slayer form

63.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
63.text: But your Father loves you dearly. You may reinherit yourself yet.
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Slayer Orin steps on the Dark Urge, threatening them.

45.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
45.text: Slaughter your line. Become the last of your name.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - CU/OTS looking at DU slayer, menacing. Cut on snarl

79.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
79.text: Lord Bhaal shall have but one Chosen.
79.context: CinematicNodeContext: [MK] - end snarl from previous shot. Profile shot framing Slayer top left and Orin lower right. alien queen-esque Faceoff. With Bhall insignia blasing behind them.

76.speaker: Narrator
76.text: *This is the truth lost in your mangled memories. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *All is as you feared. You are a spawn of Bhaal - his heir, his scion.*
22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player sits up, still reeling

66.speaker: Narrator
66.text: Tense up. That may be what you were, but it is not who you are.

31.speaker: Narrator
31.text: *And yet you know you will never be free of your Urge if you don't confront your past.*

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: Surrender to the Urge. Perhaps it is time to embrace your heritage.

58.text: All those deaths by your hand. How can you ever atone?

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *There is another. The abomination wrapped in flesh you saw in the colony. Orin.*

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: *But be wary of your confessors. Will friend turn to foe, knowing what you are?*

64.text: Recall that there was another - the woman who became the Slayer.

62.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
62.text: Tonight, you are the monster everyone claims you are.
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Dark Urge awakens in the Bhaal Temple. The Butler speaks to them as the narrator, just for this dream.

78.speaker: Sceleritas Fel
78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge stumbles and falls in the middle of the road; fade to red. Hears the butler giggling as they collapse.
